entries.abort: We really need you help. Our life support systems are failing...
entries.arrival_phase_1: Disabled freighter on scans. Stand by for update.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Freighter located. Proceed with rescue operation.
entries.complete: Good work, you have found our missing freighter. You can tell the Dantooine station that we will pick up its contract.
entries.docking_complete: Repairs completed. Freighter start up sequence underway.
entries.failed_destroy: Freighter destroyed. We are not going to help anyone who doesn't help us first.
entries.panic_2: Hey...I heard about these nut jobs.
entries.panic_4: So, first I get hit by an asteroid and disabled and now this...
entries.panic_5: Hmmmm...maybe being disabled wasn't so bad.
entries.recovery_success: The freighter is back. Good work.
entries.rescue_abandoned: You are doing what? Well then forget our deal.
entries.rescue_phase_1: Oh, wow...we thought we were done for. Thanks for finding us.
entries.rescue_phase_2: Ok, looks like we should be ready to go in just a moment. Thanks again for your help, friend.
entries.taunt_2: Prepare to become one with the great debris field.
entries.taunt_3: I thank you for the gift that you are about to give.
entries.taunt_4: May the great fireball forgive you for your sins.
entries.taunt_5: Only those who believe shall ever leave the field.
entries.thanks_1: Who were those guys? They are crazy!
entries.thanks_2: I guess they will start worshipping some of their own junk now.
entries.thanks_4: This place is nuts...I am getting out of here.
entries.thanks_5: I think they had one to many...
entries.title: Yavin System: Rescue the Disabled Freighter
